title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Standing Valet at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: This handsome valet stand helps you beat the morning rush to get ready by providing a safe, wrinkle-free place to put your clothes the night before. Add style and functionality to your bedroom or walk-in closet with this handy helper. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/Kenneth-Cole-Reaction-reg-Standing-Valet/1041570333?Keyword=men%26%2339%3bs+standing+valet. 
This handsome valet stand helps you beat the morning rush to get ready by providing a safe, wrinkle-free place to put your clothes the night before. Add style and functionality to your bedroom or walk-in closet with this handy helper. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Men's Hudson standing valet by Kenneth Cole reaction home will help keep clothing and accessories organized it was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. There's a place to hang both a suit jacket and pants to help keep them from creases and hooks for hanging belts and ties. The magnetic lidded top tray side compartments and front drawer provides ample room for storing items such as a wallet, money clip, sunglasses, watch ,and cuff-lings. At the bottom there's a shelf for storing shoes. The Hudson standing valet by Kenneth Cole reaction home is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores. Make sure to view the other items available in the men's Hudson collection.
